problem.para: Metabolism can be defined as the ________.

list.item: adjustment by an organism to external or internal changes
process whereby all unspecialized cells become specialized to perform distinct functions
process whereby new cells are formed to replace worn-out cells
sum of all chemical reactions in an organism

problem.para: Adenosine triphosphate (ATP) is an important molecule because it ________.

list.item: stores energy for use by body cells

problem.para: Cancer cells can be characterized as generic cells that perform no specialized body function. Thus cancer cells lack ________.
